title: Y Combinator Startup School
description: Free online course for entrepreneurs covering the fundamentals of starting a company.

title: MIT OpenCourseWare - Computer Science
description: Free access to MIT's computer science curriculum including lectures, assignments, and exams.

title: Stanford CS229 Machine Learning
description: Comprehensive machine learning course covering supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and deep learning.

title: Coursera Data Science Specialization
description: Complete data science program covering R programming, statistical inference, and machine learning.

title: General Assembly Web Development Bootcamp
description: Intensive 12-week program covering full-stack web development with modern technologies.

description: 9-week intensive coding bootcamp teaching Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, and modern web development.

title: Harvard CS50 Introduction to Computer Science
description: Harvard's introduction to computer science and programming, covering algorithms, data structures, and more.

title: Udacity Nanodegree Programs
description: Industry-focused programs in AI, data science, programming, and autonomous systems.
